```{r}
library(drc)

wos6 <- read.csv("input/wos6.csv")

wos6$percent_survival <- as.numeric(wos6$percent_survival)

wos6$treatment <- as.factor(wos6$treatment)

wos6$concentration <- as.numeric(wos6$concentration)

# model the ai and formulation together
ai_form_mod <- drm(percent_survival ~ concentration, treatment, data = wos6, fct = LL.4(), type = "continuous")

summary(ai_form_mod)

plot(ai_form_mod)

ED(ai_form_mod, c(50), interval = "delta")

```
